bill_title: revise certain provisions regarding operation of hog confinement facilities.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions regarding operation of hog confinement facilities. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 47-9A-13.1 be amended to read as follows: 47-9A-13.1. No corporation, except a family farm corporation, may own or operate The restrictions of §§ 47-9A-1 and 47-9A-3 do not apply to any hog confinement facility. For the purposes of this chapter a hog confinement facility is any real estate used for the breeding, farrowing and, or raising of swine. This restriction shall not apply to the acquisition of a hog confinement facility by a corporation by process of law in the collection of debts, or by any other procedure for the enforcement of a lien or claim thereon, as provided in § 47-9A-7. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
